en-US.title: Welcome
en-US.introductionFirstTime: If this is your first time using Efflux, why not take some inspiration? By default, Efflux comes with several demo songs showing off just what it can do.
en-US.introductionHelp: If you're feeling daunted using a tracker or want to get right to the good stuff (keyboard shortcuts and MIDI controllers!)
en-US.showOnStartup: Always display this window on startup
